newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Nine West said cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Nine West said cut.

text.p: -- Smith Barney downgraded Nine West Group to neutral from outperform, a source at the investment firm said.
-- Late Tuesday, Nine West said the Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating, among other things, the company's revenue recognition policies and practices.
-- Shares were halted on the New York Stock Exchange and the over-the-counter market pending news.
